t: The Zohar: Prologue, Beresheet A, Vol. 1: Shimon bar Yochai, Rav Yehuda Ashlag, Rabbi Michael Berg: 9781571890764: Amazon.com: Books
s: This is one of the 22 volumes (volumes 23 is the index) of the Zohar, (The Book of Splendor). It deals with a brand of Judaism often referred to as "Kabbalah" or "Esoteric". It is not an easy read, but offers many insightful and thought-provoking ideas on the text it evaluates.
